metadata.title: CVE-2023-46751 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the function gdev_prn_open_printer_seekable() inArtifex Ghostscript through 10.02.0 allows remote attackers to crash theapplication via a dangling pointer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-46751` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.6
ghostscript-x - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.6
libgs9 - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.6
libgs9-common - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.6').
